Comment: Note, in my annotations I use ?! and !? to be the same thing: An inaccuracy. (I never could figure out how to remember which is which.) And I think this move is an inaccuracy. Queen pawn games usually involve the c pawn, and this blocks it in.

I plan that if he captures, to recapture with either my knight or my rook. My knight because it will allow me to swing your to a nice outpost on c4, my rook because I often have trouble getting them active. (I know you're not supposed to bring your queen and rooks out early, but since my development is over it isn't bad is it?
